Crawler: Formerly Paid combat botbase, very fast
IslandGatherer: Paid botbase to gather items in Island Sancturary.
LlamaMarket: Paid botbase to to list items and update prices on the MB.
Platypus: Free+ botbase with multiple inventory and currency functions.
Minionway: Free+ Plugin to monitor character and interact with players and track stats.
BeastTribes: Paid plugin that will do daily beast tribe quests for you.
AnimaWeapons: Paid plugin that will obtain the level 60 DoW relic weapons.
MandervilleWeapons: Paid plugin that will obtain the level 90 DoW relic weapons.
SplendorousTools: Paid plugin that will obtain the level 90 DoH/DoL relic weapons.
ZodiacWeapons: Paid plugin that will obtain the level 50 DoW relic weapons.
